title: Using the Area Formula
text: The area of an ellipse is given by $$a b \pi$$. Since $$a=4$$ and $$b=3$$, the area of the ellipse is $$12\pi$$
speech: The area of an ellipse is given by  a b pi, . Since  a is equal to 4  and  b, is equal to, 3 , the area of the ellipse is  12 pi
pacedSpeech: The area of an ellipse is given by   a b pi,
, the area of the ellipse is   12 pi
